Mitch Dobney Full Stack Engineer

View Projects

Front End Focused

Dedicated self taught programmer

As a self-taught programmer, I use continuous iteration to produce results quickly and continuously improve any product I'm working on. I am certified under Harvard's CS50 program as well as having certifications in RHCE, RHCSA, RHCE, Ansible, AWS and also the following CompTia cert's, A+, Security+, Network+, Linux+ and Pentest+.

A passion for code

I constantly work on new and exciting projects and always stay attuned to the newest frameworks. I enjoy listening to tech podcasts, audiobooks and reading about tech related subjects in my spare time.
